sentences.en: Actor Michael Douglas admitted to facelift before his marriage to actress Catherine Zeta Jones in 2000.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔.道格拉斯承认自己2000年在与凯瑟琳. 泽塔琼斯结为连理之前做了拉皮手术.

sentences.en: After reading this article, you'll find that there are so many ways of non - surgical facelift.
sentences.cn: 看完这篇文章, 你就会发现,原来有很多方式, 非 手术整容.

sentences.en: And the northern section will mainly receivea facelift as it is a commercial street.
sentences.cn: 而路的北段被定位为商业街区,沿路建筑将修缮一新.

sentences.en: Before we open business, we need to get our new shop facelift.
sentences.cn: 在我们开幕之前, 新店需要大整顿.

sentences.en: But there's far more to 2003 XTR than just a facelift.
sentences.cn: 当然,新的XTR所带来的不单单是外表的改进.

sentences.en: I had a facelift in 1995, which went wrong.
sentences.cn: 我在1995年做了一次失败的面部拉皮手术。

sentences.en: If I got a facelift, I could shave fifteen years off my age.
sentences.cn: 我若做一次整容,看上去可年轻15岁.

sentences.en: Is their old website several years oldand just in need of a general facelift?
sentences.cn: 是因为他们网站上了岁数仅需要换换面貌?

sentences.en: More than a facelift, the new model marks a fundamental change of direction.
sentences.cn: 那种新型号不只是表面变动, 而是标志着根本性的方向变化.

sentences.en: Nothing gives a room a faster facelift than a coat of paint.
sentences.cn: 重新粉刷一下是使房子焕然一新的最快方法。

sentences.en: Radiofrequency is a procedure that offers an alternative to the traditional facelift.
sentences.cn: 射频技术则是替代传统面部整形的一种方法.

sentences.en: St Paul's cathedral has been given a multi - million pound facelift.
sentences.cn: 目前一项耗资几千万英镑的圣保罗大教堂翻修工程已完工.

sentences.en: Thea: Well, she's just gone into hospital for a facelift.
sentences.cn: 西亚: 嗯, 她刚刚去了医院,做整容手术.

sentences.en: We look at this reintroduction as a facelift to a proven winner.
sentences.cn: 我们认为推出这款改良版产品是个实实在在的成功.

words.tran_cn: 整容手术（除去面部皱纹）

trans.tran_cn: 去皱整容手术，面部拉皮手术，（建筑物、房间、地方的）翻新，整修
trans.tran_en: if you have a facelift, you have an operation in which doctors remove loose skin from your face in order to make you look younger
